docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs Evening of Python Coding For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Installation pip install mkdocs Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. mkdocs gh-deploy - Deploy to Github Pages Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
